jcr:content.jcr:title: List of television stations in Manitoba

contentheadline.headline: List of television stations in Manitoba

contentrichtext.text: {{inc-video}} This is a '''list of broadcast television stations''' serving cities in the Canadian province of [[Manitoba]]<ref> [http://www.user.dccnet.com/jonleblanc/Canada_TV_Stations/ Over The Air Television Stations In Canada] </ref> . [[Digital television in Canada#Mandatory Markets for Over-Air Transition to Digital|On or before August 31, 2011]], some of these stations are switching to [[digital broadcast television]]. {| class="sortable wikitable" border="2" cellpadding="4" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse" width="100%" | '''City of licence''' | '''Analog<br/>channel''' | '''Digital<br/>channel''' | '''Virtual<br/>channel''' | '''Callsign''' | '''Network''' | '''Notes''' |- style="vertical-align: top;
